description:
Tomochi Nyan always runs down the hall and invariably falls while carrying crayfish. Her destination is the big pond in back of the school. But now, the whole school is in an uproar over rumors of a monster appearing in the pond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Identity Unknown! Is Nyan`s UMA a Good UMA!?
Shoutai Fumei! Nyan no UMA wa Yoi UMA!?
正体不明! 娘(ニャン)のUMAは良いUMA!?
